description:
Doug arrived in Hawaii shortly after Isaac had.
The poor guy was really tired because from where he lives a flight to Hawaii is very, very long!
So when we got to the house he crashed and went right to bed.
The next morning, he was still dead to the world. So the rest of us went out to breakfast and we let him sleep in.
Doug didn't get out of bed until mid afternoon! And true to form he said he was two things: hungry and horny.
So we all had an early dinner and sat around bull shitting.
Isaac was itching to do another film and Doug wanted to bust a nut.
It was getting dark, though, and I wasn't sure how that was going to work.
But we had decided to be spontaneous, so we pulled out some of the lights and set them up. I figured if it didn't look good we could always try the next day.
Well, I couldn't believe how great the lighting turned out! Everything just kind of "popped" and the silhouettes of the trees in the background were, well, romantic!
There was this great little outdoor shower and that's where we started. Doug and Isaac both got wet and then Isaac started to go down on him.
Issac is a great little cock sucker!
title: Hawaii - Doug & Isaac
